name: The Only Guacamole Recipe You'll Ever Need
description: You'll be surprised how good this guacamole tastes. Easy to make too!
recipeIngredient: 2-3 tablespoons of finely chopped onion ((white or yellow))

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop 2-3 tablespoons of onion.  Use the back of a fork to smoosh the onion until it turns translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop 2-3 tablespoons of onion.  Use the back of a fork to smoosh the onion until it turns translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the onion to a bowl along with the flesh of one avocado, 1/4 teaspoon of salt, and the juice of a half lime.  Mush and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the onion to a bowl along with the flesh of one avocado, 1/4 teaspoon of salt, and the juice of a half lime.  Mush and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste for salt level.  (Avocados vary and some need more salt than others.)
recipeInstructions.name: Taste for salt level.  (Avocados vary and some need more salt than others.)

recipeInstructions.text: Keep adding tiny dashes of salt (and lime) until you like it. If it still tastes like avocado add another dash of salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep adding tiny dashes of salt (and lime) until you like it. If it still tastes like avocado add another dash of salt.
